members.member:
Returns list of all contents
ID of the content List of all contents /// Example of request \ GET '/api/contents' \
Success, returns list of all contents. No contents found. Server error.

Returns a content based on the forwarded id.
ID of the content /// Example of request \ GET 'https://localhost:44200/api/pictures/' \ --param 'contentId = f684f7ae-b1b6-4dfa-a01c-7edc54c689db'
Success, returns the specified content. A content with that ID does not exist. Server error.

member.name: M:PostMicroservice.Controllers.ContentController.UpdateContent(PostMicroservice.Models.ContentDTO.ContentUpdateDTO,System.String)
member.param: Model of the content to be updated.
member.remarks: Example of request \ PUT /api/contents \ --header 'key: Bearer Milica' \ { \ "ContentID" : "EA96AEA9-27B9-44E6-B46A-B735F559F538",\ "Title" : "Prodaja rolera",\ "Text" : "Prodajem rolere stare 6 mjeseci, u odličnom stanju.",\ "Replacement" : false,\ "State" : "odlicno",\ "ItemForSaleID" : "EA96AEA9-27B9-44E6-B46A-B735F559F538" \ }
member.response: A content with that ID does not exist.

member.name: M:PostMicroservice.Controllers.ContentController.DeleteContent(System.Guid,System.String)
member.summary: Delete content based on the forwarded ID.
member.remarks: Example of request \ DELETE '/api/contents/'\ --header 'key: Bearer Milica' \ --param 'contentId = f684f7ae-b1b6-4dfa-a01c-7edc54c689db'

member.name: M:PostMicroservice.Controllers.ContentController.GetContentOptions
member.summary: Returns options for working with contents.

member.name: T:PostMicroservice.Controllers.PictureController
member.summary: Picture controller to perform crud operations.

members.member:
Returns list of all pictures
ID of the post List of all pictures /// Example of request \ GET '/api/pictures' \
Success, returns list of all pictures. No pictures found. Server error.

Returns a picture based on the forwarded id.
ID of the picture /// Example of request \ GET 'https://localhost:44200/api/pictures/' \ --param 'pictureId = f684f7ae-b1b6-4dfa-a01c-7edc54c689db'
Success, returns the specified picture. A photo with that ID does not exist. Server error.

member.name: M:PostMicroservice.Controllers.PictureController.UpdatePicture(PostMicroservice.Models.PictureUpdateDTO,System.String)
member.param: Model of the picture to be updated.
member.remarks: Example of request \ PUT /api/pictures \ --header 'key: Bearer Milica' \ { \ "ImageId" : "F684F7AE-B1B6-4DFA-A01C-7EDC54C689DB", \ "Url" : "url",\ "PostID" : "EA96AEA9-27B9-44E6-B46A-B735F559F538" \ }
member.response: A picture with that ID does not exist.

member.name: M:PostMicroservice.Controllers.PictureController.DeletePicture(System.Guid,System.String)
member.summary: Delete picture based on the forwarded ID.
member.remarks: Example of request \ DELETE '/api/pictures/'\ --header 'key: Bearer Milica' \ --param 'pictureId = f684f7ae-b1b6-4dfa-a01c-7edc54c689db'

member.name: M:PostMicroservice.Controllers.PictureController.GetPictureOptions
member.summary: Returns options for working with pictures.
